fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Climate change, energy union, carbon capture and storage (CCS), industrial regeneration and just transition.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Change Partnership is a member of: 
 
i) Climate Action Network Europe - http://www.caneurope.org 
 
ii) Electro-mobility Platform - http://www.platformelectromobility.eu
goals__remit:
Change Partnership is an independent thought and organising platform. Its mission is to solve the politics of climate change.   
 
This is achieved by bringing together government, business and civil society to introduce policies and regulations to reduce emissions and manage the transition to a sustainable global economy.
relevant_communication: Climate change, energy union, carbon capture and storage (CCS), industrial regeneration and just transition, Electric vehicles
